name: Twin Laser
description:
A game developed for the GMTK jam 2021.

Our team members are Pedro "Pepeu", Tadeu Zuzek, João Gaspar and Alysson Sato.

This is an Asteroids like game but to destroy the asteroids you usa a laser that connects your two ships, but the laser also limits your movement so be careful!

Try to get the highest score possible!
